backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the rankings backend with player records, ranking categories, user profiles, and access-controlled admin operations (add/remove players, switch categories).
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms the old actor state (separate diamondSmp/spear arrays and a players Map) into the new unified playerRecords array format.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking two implemented features—useRemovePlayer mutation hook and the Remove Player admin flow—to their relevant files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of short summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose and notable changes of every component, hook, and page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS with OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for both light and dark themes used by shadcn/ui components.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Muti Tiers' that mounts the React app via the /src/main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that simply renders RankingsPage as the sole view.
frontend/src/components/AddPlayerModal.t: Modal dialog for adding a new player with fields for username, UUID, region, points, title, and per-category tier badges; submits via the useAddPlayer mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/AdminControls.ts: Admin toolbar with Add Player and Remove Player buttons; uses sessionStorage to track passcode unlock state and renders a player-selection dialog that calls useRemovePlayer to delete the chosen player.
frontend/src/components/CategoryTabs.tsx: Renders a tab bar for switching between game categories (Overall, Vanilla, UHC, etc.), each with a custom inline SVG icon. Accepts the active category and a change handler as props.
frontend/src/components/PasscodeModal.ts: A dialog modal that prompts for an admin passcode and calls onSuccess or onClose based on whether the hardcoded passcode matches the input.
frontend/src/components/PlayerRow.tsx: Displays a single player's ranking row including rank position (with gold/silver/bronze styling), Crafatar avatar, username, points, region badge, and tier badges.
frontend/src/components/RankingsTable.ts: Renders a filterable rankings table with a header row, loading skeleton state, and a list of PlayerRow components; shows an empty state when no players match the search query.
frontend/src/components/SearchInput.tsx: A controlled text input with a search icon and a clear button for filtering players by username.
frontend/src/components/TierBadge.tsx: Renders a small colored pill badge showing a player's tier (e.g. HT1, LT3) for a given game category, using per-category background/border colors and per-tier text colors.
frontend/src/data/mockData.ts: Defines the CategoryKey union type and exports empty mock data structures (mockPlayerData array and MOCK_DATA record) for all ranking categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated via Internet Identity), initializes admin access control when a token is present, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating player ranking data (by category, search, or all players) via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a Minecraft-inspired dark theme using CSS custom properties and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/RankingsPage.tsx: Main rankings page component that displays a filterable, categorized leaderboard table with a search input, category tabs, admin controls, and a footer.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with a Minecraft-inspired color palette, custom fonts, animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state (version 21) for 'Muti Tiers', a Minecraft PvP rankings app, including architectural notes, known issues (admin passcode persistence, backend auth guard, remove player), and a list of existing features.
